author: gdusbabek
msg: StreamingService.StreamDestinations never empties. patch by gdusbabek, reviewed by stuhood. CASSANDRA-1076

author: jglick
msg: Fix compilation inside a container which may have some 3rd-party libraries loaded somewhere but not accessible with includeantruntime="false".
Otherwise get numerous errors trying to compile e.g. JavaMail- or JSCH-related tasks from inside NetBeans.
Would be cleaner for <available> to have an option to check in the specified classpath + bootstrap & extension loader, but not elsewhere;
lacking that, have to specifically not use ignoresystemclasses="true" on anything which is likely to be part of the JRE.

author: rjung
msg: Revoke proposal which is obviously not going to fly.
We've got it in TC7 anyways.

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-1035: In places where an invalid key is used to accessed a named value, Tapestry should report the possible names better (using HTML lists, rather than a long comma-separated string)

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-1128: A space is added to a HTML start comment sequence making it impossible to add IE conditional comments
